summary: THE BRAKE BOOSTER FAILED AT AROUND 40,000 MILES. WHILE DRIVING SLOWLY WITH PRESSURE APPLIED TO THE BRAKE THE CAR SLOWS BUT THEN WHEN I APPLY ADDITIONAL PRESSURE TO STOP THE BRAKE IS HARD AND ROLLS TO A STOP INSTEAD OF STOPPING WHERE IT SHOULD. IF I AM PARKING IT WILL ALMOST ROLL INTO THE CAR PARKED IN FRONT. DEALERSHIP SAID THE BOOSTER IS GONE.
